metadata.title: CS:GO Store - Checkout
metadata.description: The checkout page of CS:GO Store allows you to easily and securely complete the purchase of your selected skins and accessories

funds.title: Add Funds
funds.text: Select how much wallet funds you want to purchase.

payment.title: Payment method
payment.payment_some_products_error: Some of the selected products ({{products}}) are out of stock and no longer available to buy.
payment.payment_some_productss_error: Some of the selected products are out of stock and no longer available to buy.
payment.payment_system_error: The system cannot process such a large order at the moment. Please try to reduce the amount.
payment.payment_too_small_error: The order amount must be more than 1 euro
payment.payment_initialisation_error: The payment system is currently unable to process your request. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
payment.payment_email_not_verified_error: You need to verify your email before making any purchases. A verification letter has been sent to your email
